roleset.name: to decrease
roleset.note: SUBSIDE-V NOTES: Corresponds to VN class other_cos-45.4. (from subside.01-v)

example.name: subside-v: intransitive
example.text: `` Adverse pressure on gross margins ... has subsided , '' Mr. Sculley said [*T*-1] .

roles.note: arg0 is not a typical role with this verb-- it occurs almost exclusively intransitively with only an arg1 for the ground.

example.name: subside-v: very unusual arg0
example.text: Houses in the most amazing places, places where there used to be houses before the rain subsided the ground under them.

example.name: subsidence-n
example.text: Here’s a shocking fact: land subsidence from groundwater pumping in the San Joaquin Valley has been called the “greatest human alteration of the Earth’s surface.”
example.arg: from groundwater pumping in the San Joaquin Valley
